com.gcu.controller

Class LibraryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcu.controller.LibraryController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/library")
public class LibraryController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is setup as a Spring controller to be used for mapping user library transactions.

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        @RequestMapping(path="/add",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Boolean addBook(@RequestParam(value="isbn")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String isbn)
        This method accepts request for users to add books to their personal library.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The ISBN of the EBook to add given as a Request Parameter.
        Returns:
        true if the book was added, false otherwise.

      • removeBook

        @RequestMapping(path="/remove",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Boolean removeBook(@RequestParam(value="isbn")
                                                                                                                  java.lang.String isbn)
        This method accepts requests for the user to remove a book from their personal library.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The ISBN of the EBook to remove given as a Request Parameter.
        Returns:
        true if the EBook was removed, false otherwise.

      • NavToLibrary

        @RequestMapping(path="/library",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView NavToLibrary(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
        This method accepts request for viewing a users library.
        Parameters:
        model - This is the model used to give feedback in the response.
        Returns:
        A new Library view containing all the EBooks in the users library.
